title: Renovated 1 Bedroom with Office ($1,750 / month)
posting_body: Must See – Renovated, Sunny 2nd floor, 1-bedroom apartment with office/study, hardwood floors throughout, oversized closets and side porch.
Updated eat in kitchen complete with built-in pantry storage and new counters.
The apartment is conveniently located in an updated well-maintained building with historic charm, on the bus line, close to the train station with easy access to major highways.
Enjoy the benefit of Downtown North Andover’s farmers market, shops and restaurants just steps from the front door.
This is a no pets, no smoking /vaping property.
1,750 month + Utilities (gas, electric and cable) Minimum of a 1-year lease, with first, last and security deposit due prior to occupancy.
Discounts may be available for multi-year leases.
A rental application with sufficient credit is required, work and rental history, income verification, subject to background, eviction, and reference checks.
To schedule an appointment,  please provide a brief description of yourself and a schedule for viewing the property
pricing and requirements subject to change
Building Management makes no warranties, whether expressed or implied, on the accuracy of the information contained within this ad.
In accordance with Mass State Law: The apartment advertised may no longer be available for rental
